sockets.display_string: +136 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,169 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description:
Use: Channel to vent flames for 2 sec, dealing 2.5 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies.

Mechanical enemies become Superheated, taking 119,718  additional Fire damage when struck by your next harmful ability. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your first melee strike against an enemy slams them and nearby enemies with a quake of shadow magic dealing up to 227,443 Shadow damage split between them.
